thread.title: A Peek Inside Ivan Belikov’s Sketchbooks of Intricate Birds & Beasts
thread.title_full: A Peek Inside Ivan Belikov’s Sketchbooks of Intricate Birds & Beasts

author: Christopher Jobson
title: A Peek Inside Ivan Belikov’s Sketchbooks of Intricate Birds & Beasts
text:
Illustration A Peek Inside Ivan Belikov’s Sketchbooks of Intricate Birds & Beasts by Christopher Jobson on January 2, 2017 
Here’s an eye-popping glimpse inside sketchbooks belonging to illustrator Ivan Belikov ( previously ) who depicts everything from the fragile wings of birds to the momentous weight of prehistoric creatures as they smash through buildings with delicate pencil strokes. He shares additional process photos and competed illustrations on Tumblr and over on Behance . See related posts on Colossal about birds , drawing , monsters . Also on Colossal...
